properties.displayName: Potential Reconnaissance For Cached Credentials Via Cmdkey.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains " -l" or ProcessCommandLine contains " /l") and (FolderPath endswith "\\cmdkey.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "cmdkey.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects usage of cmdkey to look for cached credentials on the sys
